text: Music for Cats - tune in on channel 2 or 98.8 MHz on the FM for some slow sounds to wake up to, the cats are already out and about
On Soundings - tune in on TBC or 98.8 MHz on the FM to hear some snippets of this morning’s workshop
10:30 starting with Felix’s “What if these trees could speak?”
And the ambient channel is still streaming from the Vida and Aljaž’s house
